messages.title: NOW FOR CHANGE
messages.content: What local people have said! 'His campaign to get the Council to fly the flag should not be forgotten!' 'Mark is a first class representative for Feltham & Heston. Imagine how much more he could do as the MP?' 'Your blog alone shows how much work you do.' 'Mark is a rare politician; he is genuinely decent, honest & hardworking.' 'I have the utmost respect for Mark when he says that he put honesty first, even before popularity!' 'Mark is truly on the side of local residents.' 'All my life I voted Labour - until I met Mark! He truly cares about the area and works tirelessly to improve it.' 'We have never had someone do so much to represent us!'
